issue.title: [C++][Flight] Remove the need for serialization_internal.h inside python/flight.cc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17012](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17012). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Making a separate JIRA issue for the work done in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13311> where the need for `serialization_internal.h` inside `python/flight.cc` was removed.
